```{r}
Trails<-1000
b<-2
T<-2
A0<-2.2
mu<-0.1
Theta<-0.15
dt<-0.001
n<-T/dt
ACC<-0
plot(1000,10,type="l",ylim=c(0,5),xlim=c(0,2000))

for(count in 1:Trails){
  A<-vector("numeric",length=n)
  A[1]<-A0
  hit<-0
  for(i in 1:n){
    if(A[i]<b){
      hit<-1;
      break;
    }
    A[i+1]<-A[i]+mu*A[i]*dt+Theta*A[i]*rnorm(1,0,1)*sqrt(dt)
  }
  ACC<-ACC+hit
  x<-1:(length(A))
  
  lines(x,A,type="l")
}

lines(c(0,2000),c(b,b),col="red")
print("The P(t>2): ")
print(ACC/Trails)
```
